faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: A collection of the most frequently asked questions about RADMERC University.

questions.question: Who is the target audience for the RADMERC University site?
questions.answer: This site is targeting all Installers and Assessors, however, there are other resources that may be used by other users. Please reference the Resources Page for more information.

questions.question: Who should I contact if I have a question about this site?
questions.answer: The site administrators can be reached at this email address RMU Administrators
